SEARCH
Package wtf.file.api.editable.animation

Schnittstelle EditableAnimationInformation

Alle Superschnittstellen:
AnimationInformation
public interface EditableAnimationInformation extends AnimationInformation
An interface extending AnimationInformation to provide editable functionality for animation data.

This interface allows modifying animation properties such as the number of frames, frames per second, and seconds per frame, along with fetching editable frames. It also ensures that any modifications to these properties are validated and within the allowed range.

  • Methodendetails

    • setFrames

      void setFrames(int frames) throws NumberOutOfBoundsException
      Sets the number of frames.
      Parameter:
      frames - the number of frames to set
      Löst aus:
      NumberOutOfBoundsException - if the specified number of frames is out of the valid range

    • setFramesPerSecond

      void setFramesPerSecond(int framesPerSecond) throws NumberOutOfBoundsException
      Sets the frame rate in frames per second (FPS). This method is used when the timing is FPS-coded.
      Parameter:
      framesPerSecond - the number of frames per second to set
      Löst aus:
      NumberOutOfBoundsException - if the specified FPS value is out of the valid range

    • setSecondsPerFrame

      void setSecondsPerFrame(int secondsPerFrame) throws NumberOutOfBoundsException
      Sets the duration of a frame in seconds. This method is used when the timing is SPF-coded.
      Parameter:
      secondsPerFrame - the duration of a single frame in seconds
      Löst aus:
      NumberOutOfBoundsException - if the specified SPF value is out of the valid range

    • frame

      EditableFrame frame(int index)
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: AnimationInformation
      Retrieves a specific frame by index.
      Angegeben von:
      frame in Schnittstelle AnimationInformation
      Parameter:
      index - the zero-based index of the frame to retrieve
      Gibt zurück:
      the Frame at the specified index
